mapper.select: SELECT HNO, H.USERID, H.HTITLE, H.HCONTENT, H.HWRITER, H.HCOUNT, H.HDATE, H.HSTATUS, H.HPREVIEW, NVL(SUM(DECODE(HL.GOOD, 'Y', 1,'N', 0)),0) "LIKECOUNT" FROM HOTSPOT_BOARD H FULL JOIN HOTSPOT_LIKE HL USING(HNO) WHERE H.HSTATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY HNO, H.USERID, H.HTITLE, H.HCONTENT, H.HWRITER, H.HCOUNT, H.HDATE, H.HSTATUS, H.HPREVIEW ORDER BY HNO DESC
